businessRule.name: FCP_APP_Selection_Refresh_Metadata
businessRule.sourceCode:
Imports System Imports System.Data Imports System.Data.Common Imports System.IO Imports System.Collections.Generic Imports System.Globalization Imports System.Linq Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic Imports System.Windows.Forms Imports OneStream.Shared.Common Imports OneStream.Shared.Wcf Imports OneStream.Shared.Engine Imports OneStream.Shared.Database Imports OneStream.Stage.Engine Imports OneStream.Stage.Database Imports OneStream.Finance.Engine Imports OneStream.Finance.Database
Namespace OneStream.BusinessRule.DashboardExtender.FCP_APP_Selection_Refresh_Metadata Public Class MainClass Public Function Main(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As Object, ByVal args As DashboardExtenderArgs) As Object Try
Select Case args.FunctionType
Case Is = DashboardExtenderFunctionType.ComponentSelectionChanged If (args.FunctionName = "SetSelectedApps") Then
'Dim scenarioTo As String = BRApi.Dashboards.Parameters.GetLiteralParameterValue(si, False, "DBP_ScenarioTo") Dim sValue As String = args.TaskInfo.CustomSubstVars("param_app_list_send_to_fcp") brapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"selected apps: " & sValue) Brapi.Dashboards.Parameters.SetLiteralParameterValue(si,False,"param_app_list_selected",sValue)
If Not String.IsNullOrEmpty(sValue) Then 'Create a message Dim message As String = "Updated selected app list"
'Save the updated Literal Parameter BRApi.Dashboards.Parameters.SetLiteralParameterValue(si, False, "DBP_ScenarioTo", sValue)
'Set the return value Dim selectionChangedTaskResult As New XFSelectionChangedTaskResult() selectionChangedTaskResult.IsOK = True selectionChangedTaskResult.ShowMessageBox = False selectionChangedTaskResult.Message = message selectionChangedTaskResult.ChangeSelectionChangedUIActionInDashboard = False selectionChangedTaskResult.ModifiedSelectionChangedUIActionInfo = Nothing selectionChangedTaskResult.ChangeSelectionChangedNavigationInDashboard = False selectionChangedTaskResult.ModifiedSelectionChangedNavigationInfo = Nothing selectionChangedTaskResult.ChangeCustomSubstVarsInDashboard = False selectionChangedTaskResult.ModifiedCustomSubstVars = Nothing selectionChangedTaskResult.ChangeCustomSubstVarsInLaunchedDashboard = False selectionChangedTaskResult.ModifiedCustomSubstVarsForLaunchedDashboard = Nothing
Return selectionChangedTaskResult End If Else If (args.FunctionName = "SetSelectedDims") Then
'Dim scenarioTo As String = BRApi.Dashboards.Parameters.GetLiteralParameterValue(si, False, "DBP_ScenarioTo") Dim sValue As String = args.TaskInfo.CustomSubstVars("param_dim_list_send_to_fcp") brapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"selected dim: " & sValue) Brapi.Dashboards.Parameters.SetLiteralParameterValue(si,False,"param_dim_list_selected",sValue)
If Not String.IsNullOrEmpty(sValue) Then 'Create a message Dim message As String = "Updated selected dim list"
'Save the updated Literal Parameter BRApi.Dashboards.Parameters.SetLiteralParameterValue(si, False, "DBP_ScenarioTo", sValue)
'Set the return value Dim selectionChangedTaskResult As New XFSelectionChangedTaskResult() selectionChangedTaskResult.IsOK = True selectionChangedTaskResult.ShowMessageBox = False selectionChangedTaskResult.Message = message selectionChangedTaskResult.ChangeSelectionChangedUIActionInDashboard = False selectionChangedTaskResult.ModifiedSelectionChangedUIActionInfo = Nothing selectionChangedTaskResult.ChangeSelectionChangedNavigationInDashboard = False selectionChangedTaskResult.ModifiedSelectionChangedNavigationInfo = Nothing selectionChangedTaskResult.ChangeCustomSubstVarsInDashboard = False selectionChangedTaskResult.ModifiedCustomSubstVars = Nothing selectionChangedTaskResult.ChangeCustomSubstVarsInLaunchedDashboard = False selectionChangedTaskResult.ModifiedCustomSubstVarsForLaunchedDashboard = Nothing
Return selectionChangedTaskResult End If
End If
End Select
If args.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("SendToFCP") Then
'GET SELECTED APPLICATIONS Dim sValue As String = BRApi.Dashboards.Parameters.GetLiteralParameterValue(si, False, "param_app_list_send_to_fcp") 'Dim sValue As String = args.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("SelectedValues") brapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"test apps: " & sValue)
End If
Return Nothing Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function End Class End Namespace

businessRule.name: DimensionApplication
businessRule.sourceCode:
' Imports System Imports System.Data Imports System.Data.Common Imports System.IO Imports System.Collections.Generic Imports System.Globalization Imports System.Linq Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic Imports System.Windows.Forms Imports OneStream.Shared.Common Imports OneStream.Shared.Wcf Imports OneStream.Shared.Engine Imports OneStream.Shared.Database Imports OneStream.Stage.Engine Imports OneStream.Stage.Database Imports OneStream.Finance.Engine Imports OneStream.Finance.Database
Namespace OneStream.BusinessRule.DashboardStringFunction.DimensionApplication Public Class MainClass Public Function Main(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As Object, ByVal args As DashboardStringFunctionArgs) As Object Try
'GetRequestId ' Parameter Example: BRString(ACM_Tools, GetRequestId, ID=|!prm_acm_request_number!|)
If args.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetRequestId") Then
Return si.UserName
Else If args.FunctionName.XFContainsIgnoreCase("GetTextBoxValue") Then Dim xfEnv As New XFEnvironment () Dim appAdminInfo As XFApplicationAdminInitInfo = xfEnv.GetApplicationAdminInitInfo(si) Dim appInfoList As List(Of xfApplicationInfo)= appAdminInfo.Applications Dim appList = appInfoList.Select(Function(x) x.Application.Name).ToList()
Dim str As String = String.Join(", ",appList)
Return str Else If args.FunctionName.XFContainsIgnoreCase("UpdateList") Then Dim currentUserName As String = si.AuthToken.UserName Dim userInfo As UserInfo = BRApi.Security.Admin.GetUser(si, currentUserName) Dim email As String = userInfo.User.Email
Dim sql As String = $"SELECT DISTINCT Module FROM dbo.XFT_Global_Parameters WHERE Parmname = 'EmailDist' and ParmValue like '%{email}%'" Dim sProcess As String = "" Using dbConn As DbConnInfo = BRApi.Database.CreateApplicationDbConnInfo(si) Dim dt As DataTable = BRApi.Database.ExecuteSql(dbConn, sql, False) For Each dr As DataRow In dt.Rows sProcess += dr("Module") & "," Next End Using BRAPi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"{sProcess}") Return sProcess
Else If args.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetApplicationList") Then Dim xfEnv As New XFEnvironment () Dim appAdminInfo As XFApplicationAdminInitInfo = xfEnv.GetApplicationAdminInitInfo(si) Dim appInfoList As List(Of xfApplicationInfo)= appAdminInfo.Applications Dim appList As List(Of String) = appInfoList.Select(Function(x) x.Application.Name).ToList()
Dim AppName=Brapi.Dashboards.Parameters.GetLiteralParameterValue(si,False,"param_app_list_selected") If String.IsNullOrEmpty(AppName) Then Brapi.Dashboards.Parameters.SetLiteralParameterValue(si,False,"param_app_list_selected",String.Join(",",appList)) End If Return String.Join(",",appList)
Else If args.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetDimensionList") Then Dim currentUserName As String = si.AuthToken.UserName Dim userInfo As UserInfo = BRApi.Security.Admin.GetUser(si, currentUserName) Dim email As String = userInfo.User.Email
Dim sql As String = $"SELECT ParmValue FROM dbo.XFT_Global_Parameters WHERE Parmname = 'Names' and Module ='DimensionData'" Dim sProcess As String = "" Using dbConn As DbConnInfo = BRApi.Database.CreateApplicationDbConnInfo(si) Dim dt As DataTable = BRApi.Database.ExecuteSql(dbConn, sql, False) For Each dr As DataRow In dt.Rows sProcess += dr("ParmValue") & "," Next End Using BRAPi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"{sProcess}") Return sProcess
Else If args.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetScenarioList") Then ' Dim currentUserName As String = si.AuthToken.UserName ' Dim userInfo As UserInfo = BRApi.Security.Admin.GetUser(si, currentUserName) ' Dim email As String = userInfo.User.Email
Dim sql As String = $"SELECT DISTINCT Sn FROM dbo.StageSourceData Order by Sn asc" Dim sScenarioList As String = "" Using dbConn As DbConnInfo = BRApi.Database.CreateApplicationDbConnInfo(si) Dim dt As DataTable = BRApi.Database.ExecuteSql(dbConn, sql, False) For Each dr As DataRow In dt.Rows sScenarioList += dr("Sn") & "," Next End Using BRAPi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"{sScenarioList}") Return sScenarioList
Else If args.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetWorkFlowProfileListForFcst") Or args.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetWorkFlowProfileListForAct") Then
Dim sCubeName As String = "" If args.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetWorkFlowProfileListForFcst") Then sCubeName = args.CustomSubstVars.XFGetValue("prm_Select_Fcst_Cube_List") Else sCubeName = args.CustomSubstVars.XFGetValue("prm_Select_Act_Cube_List") End If 'BRAPi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"sCubeName ==>> {sCubeName}")
'WHERE CubeName = '"+sCubeName+"'
Dim sql As String = $"SELECT distinct profileName FROM dbo.WorkFlowProfileHierarchy WHERE CubeName = '"+sCubeName+"' Order by profileName asc" Dim sWFProfileList As String = ""
Dim AppName = Brapi.Dashboards.Parameters.GetLiteralParameterValue(si,False,"prm_LoadFCPData_app_list_selected") Dim newSeshInfo As SessionInfo = BRApi.Security.Authorization.CreateSessionInfoForAnotherApp(si, appName.TrimStart(), openAppResult.Success)
Using dbConn As DbConnInfo = BRApi.Database.CreateApplicationDbConnInfo(newSeshInfo) Dim dt As DataTable = BRApi.Database.ExecuteSql(dbConn, sql, False) For Each dr As DataRow In dt.Rows sWFProfileList += dr("profileName") & "," Next End Using 'BRAPi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"{sWFProfileList}") Return sWFProfileList
Else If args.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetCubesList") Then
Dim sql As String = $"SELECT distinct Name FROM dbo.Cube Order by Name asc" Dim sCubeList As String = ""
Dim AppName = Brapi.Dashboards.Parameters.GetLiteralParameterValue(si,False,"prm_LoadFCPData_app_list_selected") Dim newSeshInfo As SessionInfo = BRApi.Security.Authorization.CreateSessionInfoForAnotherApp(si, appName.TrimStart(), openAppResult.Success)
Using dbConn As DbConnInfo = BRApi.Database.CreateApplicationDbConnInfo(newSeshInfo) Dim dt As DataTable = BRApi.Database.ExecuteSql(dbConn, sql, False) For Each dr As DataRow In dt.Rows sCubeList += dr("Name") & "," Next End Using 'BRAPi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"{sWFProfileList}") Return sCubeList
End If
Return Nothing Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function End Class End Namespace

adapter.name: da_DB_FCP_FETCH_APPNAME_FROM_GLOBAL_TABLE
adapter.sqlQuery: Select ParmValue FROM XFT_Global_Parameters Where Module = 'DimensionData' AND AppName = 'Walmart Dev' AND ParmName ='AppNames'

adapter.name: da_DB_FCP_PUT_ENT_ES_TaskActivity_DMJOB_Dimension_Data
adapter.sqlQuery:
SELECT TOP 1
(CASE WHEN [TaskActivityType] = 1000 THEN 'Data Mgmt' END) AS 'TaskType'
,(CASE WHEN TaskActivityStatus = -1 THEN 'Unknown' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 0 THEN 'Queued' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 1000 THEN 'Running' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 2000 THEN 'Canceled-By-User' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 3000 THEN 'Canceled-By-Adm' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 4000 THEN 'Canceled-By-Sys' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 5000 THEN 'Failed' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 6000 THEN 'Completed' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 99999 THEN 'Imported Item' ELSE 'Unknown' END) AS 'TaskStatus'
,[Description] ,[StartTime] ,[EndTime] ,[LastActivityTime]
FROM TaskActivity
WHERE [TaskActivityType] = '1000' AND Description = 'Send_Dimension_To_FCP' AND TaskActivityStatus = '6000'
ORDER BY LastActivityTime Desc

adapter.name: da_Db_FCP_PUT_ENT_ES_USERNAME
adapter.sqlQuery:
SELECT TOP 1
(CASE WHEN [TaskActivityType] = 1000 THEN 'Data Mgmt' END) AS 'TaskType'
,(CASE WHEN TaskActivityStatus = -1 THEN 'Unknown' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 0 THEN 'Queued' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 1000 THEN 'Running' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 2000 THEN 'Canceled-By-User' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 3000 THEN 'Canceled-By-Adm' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 4000 THEN 'Canceled-By-Sys' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 5000 THEN 'Failed' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 6000 THEN 'Completed' WHEN TaskActivityStatus = 99999 THEN 'Imported Item' ELSE 'Unknown' END) AS 'TaskStatus'
,*
FROM TaskActivity
WHERE [TaskActivityType] = '1000' AND Description = 'Send_Dimension_To_FCP' AND TaskActivityStatus = '6000'
ORDER BY LastActivityTime Desc

component.xfText: *To refresh metadata please select applications from left checkbox list and click "Refresh Metadata" button. This will send metadata for all selected applications to FCP.
